57997.「いったい なにごとだべ！？: What in the world was that?!

57999.「ごきげんよう メルサンディ村の皆様。: A good day to you all of Melsandy Village.

58000.「……永遠の夜とともに \n 魔女グレイツェル 参りました<heart>:
With eternal night comes, me, the beautiful
witch Gretzel. <heart>

58001.「てめえが ザンクローネ様の言ってた\n 村に 化け物どもを送り込んだ\n 魔女:
You're that witch who sent those creatures to
the village Zankrone told us about!

58002.「ウフフッ。私が贈った プレゼント\n よろこんでいただけたかしら？:
Hehehe... did you all enjoy my little
present?

58003.「プレゼントだとぉおおおお！？ \n てめえのせいで どんだけ 村人が\n 犠牲:
Did you say a present?! Do you know how many
villagers have been sacrificed because of
you?!

58004.「キャハ<heart> よろこんでもらえて うれしいわ。 \n これからも もっ:
Ohhh... <heart> It warms my heart to hear you
all enjoyed it so much. There will definitely
be no shortage of entertainment!

58006.「オレたちには ザンクローネ様がいる！\n ザンクローネ様は 呼べば\n 必ず:
We all got Zankrone! He always comes to save
the day!

58007.「クスクス。そう言うと思ったわ<heart>\n あなたたちの 信じる心が\n:
Heh... how predictable. I knew you'd say that.
After all, your faith in him is the source of
his power!

58008.「だから 今日はね\n そのくだらない心を 消しにきたの！！\n 私が 服従する:
That's why I've come here, to make you see
the error of your ways! Instead I shall teach
you the joys of submission...

58009.「み～んな 私のしもべに なりなさ～い<heart>:
All of you shall become my most heartfelt
servants! <heart>

58013.「滅ぼせ！ 滅ぼせ！ ザンクローネを滅ぼせ！: Kill him! Kill him! Kill Zankrone!

58015.「キャハハハッ！！\n これで 村人たちの希望で 動いている\n ザンクローネは:
Ahahaha! And with that, Zankrone can kiss
his hero status bye-bye!

58016.「メルサンディ村に\n 英雄なんて いらないわ……<heart>: Melsandy has no need for heroes... <heart>

58018.「ハァ…………。 \n 本当に お前には みっともねえとこばっか\n 見られちま:
*sigh*... she sure is making me look pathetic
right now...

58019.「メルサンディの村人を あやつり人形にするとは\n やってくれるぜ 魔女……。\:
That witch sure did a number on the village,
turning everyone into puppets and all...
That's how I got into this mess.

58020.「お前が持ってるパンを 俺にくれないか？<yesno><close>: Mind giving me some of that bread you have?<yesno><close>

58021.「今 俺にチカラを与えられるのは \n お前の持っている そのパンだけだ。\n:
That bread is the only thing that can give me
the strength I need right now...
Please, give it to me.<yesno><close>

58023.「……相変わらず パンチの効いた味だぜ。\n 身体中が ほてってきやがる。:
And it still packs a punch...
My whole body's burning up.

58024.「あいつ以外に このパンを \n 作るヤツが いるなんてな……。:
Hard to believe someone other than her could
make this...

58025.「なあ <pc>……\n 聞いてくれねえか。遠い昔の話を……:
Hey, do you mind listening to me for a
minute? It's about the past...

58027.「メルサンディ村の精霊さま。 \n これからも 村をお守りください……。:
To the spirit of Melsandy Village...
Please continue to protect us...

58028.「俺は 元々 このほこらに祀られた\n メルサンディ村を見守る 精霊だった。:
I was originally the spirit that watched over
Melsandy Village, which was enshrined in
this rock.

58029.「だが 村から遠い 小さなほこらは\n 長い年月の間に 村人たちからも\n 忘れ:
But this tiny shrine had eventually been long
forgotten by the villagers...

58030.「たったひとり 毎日のように\n そうじをしにきて パンを供えてく\n 風変わり:
Except for this one strange villager girl,
who'd come every day to clean and offer
bread.

58031.「……礼が言いてえと 思ったんだ。: I just wanted to thank her...

58032.「気がついたら 人の姿になっちまってた。 \n 俺は 精霊の禁忌をおかし \n:
I then found myself in human form. I committed
a taboo of spirits, and went to the village to
see that girl face to face.

58033.「そしたら 村娘が 魔物に襲われててよ。\n 助けるために はじめて剣を振るった:
Soon after, I found a villager being attacked
by monsters. For the first time, I swung my
sword in order to save her.

58034.「その姿を見ていた 村人たちが\n 俺に 魔物退治を頼んできた。:
The other villagers who saw me asked me to
eliminate monsters again and again.

58035.「……頼られるのが うれしくてな。\n いくたびか 剣をふるい 魔物を退けるうち:
It felt good to be depended on... After
defeating many monsters, the villagers began
to call me a hero.

58036.「そして ある日のこと…… あの村娘が\n 突然 妙なことを言いだしてな。:
And then, one day... that villager girl said
something very strange.

58037.「娘は 俺に村を捨ててほしいと……\n 一緒に 別の場所で暮らそうと願ってきた。:
She said that she wanted me to leave the
village with her, and go live somewhere
else...

58038.「だが この地の精霊である俺は \n それは できないと 冷たく突き放すしか\n:
But, being the spirit of this land, I had no
choice but to firmly tell her I couldn't do
such a thing...

58039.「……間もなく あの娘は 姿を消した。: Not long after that, the girl disappeared...

58040.「このほこらも すっかり汚れちまったな……。: The shrine is so dirty now...

58041.「聞いてくれて ありがとよ。\n うめえパンのおかげで 元気出たぜ。:
Hey, thanks for listening. The bread really
got me back on my feet.

58042.「俺は 魔女を追わなきゃならねえ……じゃあな。:
I gotta go after that witch now...
See you later.

100770.「それにしても……懐かしい においだ。: Even still... I recognize that smell.
